resources.string: Go in nature by yourself with no predetermined route (or very minimal one) or length of time. What was the most exciting thing that happened during that walk? Were you thinking a lot? Or not at all? What was in your head?
Pick an artistic medium you are not comfortable with and just create. Try not to judge or compare yourself to others!

"Find the most inspiring tree around your area, and give it a big hug.
While youâ€™re there take a long breath, and thank that tree for the air you are breathing."
Was it your first experience of hugging a tree? How did you feel?
How do you feel about doing this exercise in public?
What did this exercise bring you?
